mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTI (receiver_no, noti_type, content, target_no) VALUES (#{receiverNo}, #{notiType}, #{content}, #{targetNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTI WHERE receiver_no = #{receiverNo} AND is_read = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTI SET is_read = TRUE WHERE noti_no = #{notiNo}
